nodes.text: Lemnos, commonly known as Lem, was a mechanic who was an acquaintance of Captain Hera Syndulla of the Spectres. During the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire, Lemnos worked as a mechanic at the Fekunda Outpost under Commander Zhou and his Stormtrooper squad. Lemnos wore grey overalls.

Lemnos first appeared in the third issue of the Star Wars: Forces of Destiny comic series. Although Lemnos's species was not mentioned in the comic, its author Devin Grayson has stated on social media that he was meant to be a member of the Selonian species from Star Wars Legends.
